best game out of the CS franchise
Really worth the money. 100% would pick up again!

I thought i purchased this game solely for the purpose of GMOD textures.

I ended up being wrong, for all of the right reasons, because this game pulled me in.

I wasn't there during the golden ages of Counter-Strike but i'm glad i got to experience it in this day and age where technology evolved ever so slightly.

The franchise itself had its humble beginnings with Half-Life and evolved into what it is.

Global offensive is what the evolution of Counter-Strike is but this game built the foundation for it.

It's 100x better than csgo that's for sure.
